records.location_details: Location of the incident: Text Removed - Operational Area, Romania. Latitude: Text Removed - Operational Area. Longitude: Text Removed - Operational Area. Reference to the operational area: Yes.
records.context_note: An individual tested positive for COVID-19 in an immediate deployment location in Romania. The person self-isolated and colleagues who shared the same office were tested. The individual later tested negative.
records.evidence_quote: On 17.03.2021, around 19:00 LT, Text Removed - Human Resources informed Text Removed - Human Resources about his "positive" status on COVID-19.

records.location_details: Location of the incident: Text Removed - Operational Area, Romania. Latitude: Text Removed - Operational Area. Longitude: Text Removed - Operational Area. Reference to the operational area: Yes.
records.where_clear: Operational Area in Romania, near Timisoara
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within the operational area is redacted, but medical treatment occurred in Timisoara.
records.context_note: An individual was injured during recreational skiing, falling 6 meters and sustaining a dislocated leg and hip, broken cheek bones, broken nose, and a hematoma. The person was transported to Timisoara County Hospital for treatment and remained in hospital under observation, then took medical leave before returning to duties.
records.evidence_quote: On 07.03.2021 around 19:28 LT Text Removed - Human Resources informed Text Removed - Human Resources that Text Removed - Human Resources had an accident during his free time. While he was skiing, he slipped on a wet snow or piece of ice, he lost a balance and control, falling 6 meters into the depth, hitting the ground with his face and frontal part of the body.
